house_listing.house_description: Quiet cul-de-sac, home features formal living & dining rms, family rm with beamed ceiling & masonary fireplace, eat-in kit w/cathedral ceiling, skylite & island. Workbench & shelves in garage, sec. System, garage door opener, window treatments, 4th bedroom can be bonus room.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Garage Door Opener, Pantry, Skylights, Walk-In Closet(s), Workshop
